alluxio.client

Class FileSystemTestUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • alluxio.client.FileSystemTestUtils

  • @ThreadSafe
public final class FileSystemTestUtils
extends Object
    Utility class for testing the Alluxio file system.

        Creates a simple file with len bytes.
        Parameters:
        fs - a FileSystem handler
        fileName - the name of the file to be created
        len - file size in bytes
        options - options to create the file with
        Throws:
        IOException - if path is invalid (e.g., illegal URI)

        public static List<String> listFiles(FileSystem fs,
                                     String path)
                              throws IOException
        Returns a list of files at a given path.
        Parameters:
        fs - a FileSystem handler
        path - a path in alluxio file system
        Returns:
        a list of strings representing the file names under the given path
        Throws:
        IOException - if path does not exist or is invalid
